item.title: NextCloud Docker Setup
item.description:
I set up a disk station, deployed NextCloud as my personal cloud, and found it to be a full-service dropbox, which costs only ~20$ / Gb. To be bug free

version: '3.2'
services:
  nextcloud:
    image: nextcloud
    container_name: nextcloud
    restart: always
    networks:
      - net
    ports:
      - 3222:80
    labels:
      - "traefik.docker.network=net"
      - "traefik.enable=true"
      - "traefik.backend=nextcloud"
      - "traefik.port=80"
      - "traefik.protocol=http"
      - "traefik.frontend.rule=Host:realsix.synology.me"
      - "traefik.frontend.headers.customResponseHeaders=Strict-Transport-Security:15552000"
      - "traefik.frontend.passHostHeader=true"
      - "traefik.frontend.redirect.permanent:true"
      - "traefik.frontend.redirect.regex:https://(.*)/.well-known/(card|cal)dav"
      - "traefik.frontend.redirect.replacement:https://$$1/remote.php/dav/"
    depends_on:
      - nextcloud_db
    volumes:
      - /volume1/docker/nc/nextcloud:/var/www/html
      - /volume1/docker/nc/config:/var/www/html/config
      - /volume1/docker/nc/data:/var/www/html/data
      - /volume1/homes/llychinalz/old_projects:/var/www/html/data/llychinalz/files/0_old
      - /volume1/homes/llychinalz/data:/var/www/html/data/llychinalz/files/0_data
      - /volume1/docker/nc/themes:/var/www/html/themes
    environment:
      - "MYSQL_HOST=nextcloud_db"
      - "NEXTCLOUD_TRUSTED_DOMAINS=realsix.synology.me"
      - "REDIS_HOST=nextcloud_redis"
    depends_on:
      - nextcloud_db
      - redis

  nextcloud_db:
    image: mariadb
    container_name: nextcloud_db
    command: --transaction-isolation=READ-COMMITTED --binlog-format=ROW
    restart: always
    networks:
      - net
    volumes:
      - /volume1/docker/nc/db:/var/lib/mysql
    environment:
      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD="Lly_940410"
      - MYSQL_PASSWORD="Lly_940410"
      - MYSQL_DATABASE=nextcloud
      - MYSQL_USER=nextcloud

  redis:
    image: redis
    container_name: nextcloud_redis
    networks:
      - net

  cron:
    image: nextcloud
    container_name: nextcloud_cron
    restart: always
    networks:
      - net
    volumes:
      - /volume1/docker/nc/nextcloud:/var/www/html
    entrypoint: /cron.sh
    depends_on:
      - nextcloud_db
      - redis

volumes:
  nextcloud:
  nextcloud_db:
  nextcloud_cron:

networks:
  net:
    external: true

To speed up sync, I use sudo -u www-data php occ files:scan --path "llychinalz/files/...

item.title: They really give me ~700$ for free...
item.description:
The handshake organization donated $10.2MM and is giving away free HNS (can be exchanged into BTC). I tried it my self, and got ~700$ for free (except an unused ssh key).

The tutorial is available at: Zhihu. I would recommend you to use an out-dated ssh key for verification (I’m using one from DM2, which has not been used for more than 6 months, according to Github). I delete that key after this process and generate a new one.

Notes:

  • For error message gyp: No Xcode or CLT version detected!, xcode-select --install works for me.
  • For error message Xcode-select: error: invalid developer directory..., directly delete the directory and run xcode-select --install works for me.
  • I set fee to 0.1.
